Analysis of Variance

Source: R/anova.R
anova.Rd

Analysis of Variance

anova(df, keep_data_object = FALSE)

Arguments

df

data frame
keep_data_object

logical to keep objects from aov and TukeyHSD

Examples

data(gw_data)

wells <- c("MW-1", "MW-2", "MW-3", "MW-4")

params <- c("Calcium, dissolved", "Sodium, dissolved", "Sulfate, total")

gw_data %>%
  filter(location_id %in% wells, param_name %in% params) %>%
  anova()
#> # A tibble: 18 x 6
#>    param_name         rowname     diff      lwr      upr    p.adj
#>    <chr>              <chr>      <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 Sodium, dissolved  MW-2-MW-1   6.77   2.87     10.7   1.16e- 4
#>  2 Sodium, dissolved  MW-3-MW-1  11.4    7.47     15.3   2.42e-10
#>  3 Sodium, dissolved  MW-4-MW-1   4.04   0.0335    8.05  4.73e- 2
#>  4 Sodium, dissolved  MW-3-MW-2   4.61   0.703     8.51  1.42e- 2
#>  5 Sodium, dissolved  MW-4-MW-2  -2.73  -6.73      1.28  2.88e- 1
#>  6 Sodium, dissolved  MW-4-MW-3  -7.33 -11.3      -3.32  4.59e- 5
#>  7 Sulfate, total     MW-2-MW-1  83.6   65.5     102.    0.      
#>  8 Sulfate, total     MW-3-MW-1  42.2   24.1      60.3   2.41e- 7
#>  9 Sulfate, total     MW-4-MW-1   7.12 -11.5      25.7   7.46e- 1
#> 10 Sulfate, total     MW-3-MW-2 -41.4  -59.6     -23.3   3.78e- 7
#> 11 Sulfate, total     MW-4-MW-2 -76.5  -95.1     -57.9   0.      
#> 12 Sulfate, total     MW-4-MW-3 -35.1  -53.7     -16.5   2.64e- 5
#> 13 Calcium, dissolved MW-2-MW-1  -5.42 -20.6       9.75  7.84e- 1
#> 14 Calcium, dissolved MW-3-MW-1 -15.0  -30.2       0.127 5.28e- 2
#> 15 Calcium, dissolved MW-4-MW-1  14.8   -0.774    30.4   6.85e- 2
#> 16 Calcium, dissolved MW-3-MW-2  -9.62 -24.8       5.55  3.48e- 1
#> 17 Calcium, dissolved MW-4-MW-2  20.2    4.65     35.8   5.67e- 3
#> 18 Calcium, dissolved MW-4-MW-3  29.9   14.3      45.4   1.92e- 5

anova_object <- gw_data %>%
  filter(location_id %in% wells, param_name %in% params) %>%
  anova(., keep_data_object = TRUE)

plot(anova_object$anova[[1]], 1)
